H0.text: Mearth was the name of the child of which US tv characters. The Waltons

H1.text: Mearth was the name of the child of which US tv characters. The Huxtables

A4.text: The Waltons children are John-Boy, Jim-Bob, Elizabeth, Mary Ellen, Erin, Ben, and James Robert 'Jim-Bob'.
